newsitem.title: USA: EquiVantage unit files $500 mln shelf.
newsitem.headline: EquiVantage unit files $500 mln shelf.

text.p: EquiVantage Acceptance Corp, a unit of EquiVantage Inc filed Tuesday a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to $500 million in mortgage loan asset-backed securities.

Net proceeds will be used to finance the purchase of, or to repay short-term loans incurred to finance the purchase of, the mortgage loans underlying the securities or will be used for general corporate purposes.
The parent, based in Houston, Texas, is primarily engaged in acquiring, owning, transferring and service mortgage loans.
